name: pocketdex
description: Pocketdex is an indexer for the Shannon implementation of the pocket network protocol.

scripts.vendor:setup: echo 'installing and building vendor modules' && yarn vendor:cosmjs:install && yarn vendor:cosmjs:build && yarn vendor:subql:install && yarn install && yarn vendor:subql:build
scripts.vendor:clean-cache: cd vendor && yarn cache clean --all && cd cosmjs && yarn cache clean --all
scripts.vendor:cosmjs:install: cd vendor && yarn workspace cosmjs-monorepo-root install
scripts.vendor:cosmjs:build: cd vendor && yarn workspace cosmjs-monorepo-root run build
scripts.vendor:subql:build: cd vendor && yarn workspace @subql/node-cosmos run build
scripts.vendor:cosmjs:lint: cd vendor && yarn workspace cosmjs-monorepo-root lint
scripts.vendor:clean: echo 'cleaning vendor modules' && cd vendor && find . -name node_modules | xargs rm -rf && find . -name dist | xargs rm -rf
scripts.docker:start: docker compose pull && docker compose  up --remove-orphans

author: Grove Team
